title: Mathematics-Science Integrated Education Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics and science concepts, foundational pedagogy
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/in-service teachers emphasizing real-life integrated lesson design

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 80% or more of the core principles of integrated mathematics-science education models.
Learners can design and present an integrated lesson plan for real-world problem-solving within 90 minutes.
Using a formative assessment rubric, learners can evaluate peer teachersâ€™ lesson designs with three or more specific feedback points.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
